summary: Four youths share a two bedroom apartment in a corner of Tokyo. A series of assault cases occur in the same district. Eighteen year old Satoru, a male prostitute, joins them as a new house mate. Their daily life slowly starts to change.
cast: Tatsuya Fujiwara|Karina|Shihori Kanjiya|Kento Hayashi|Keisuke Koide|Terunosuke Takezai|Maho Nonami|Yuri Nakamura|Atsushi Fukazawa|Kyônosuke Hanai|Kazuki Namioka|Kiyoko Negishi|Mitsuyo Ishigaki|Kumi Imura|Maiko Sadahira|Mari Maeda|Toshihiro Yashiba|Misaki Momose|Atsushi Yamanaka|Win Morisaki|Syuji Otsuki|Runa Endo|Yuna Mikuni|Natsumi Seto|Kon Arimura|Miki Kurihara|Shinji Kitamura|Masaki Miura|Masaya Kikawada|Chisato Morishita|Ayame Misaki|Midoriko Kimura|Bokuzô Masana|Renji Ishibashi|Marina Kozawa
title: Parêdo
